column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This was my second time getting ramen
column2: the only other place I have been is Ninja Ramen in the heights. It was really good. I was unsure of what to order and the waitress talked me through my options and what she typically recommends to new people and what is generally popular. I sat at the back bar with my friend and it was fun to watch all the movement in the kitchen area. The food was great
column3: I ate almost all of it (rare for me). So overall this place it great. The hostesses are communicable
column4: the servers are knowledgeable and the food is tasty. What more could you ask for?
